function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Long-term operation of the filter without replacement or maintenance","Impact":"Risk of increased contaminant concentration due to filter inefficiency","Mitigation":"Regular replacement or maintenance of the filter","Technologies":"Filter monitoring systems, smart filters","People":"Occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Contaminant leakage from the chamber or filter system","Impact":"Increased risk of contaminant exposure in the built environment","Mitigation":"Sealing of leakage points, periodic inspection of filter system","Technologies":"Leak detection systems, air pressure monitoring","People":"Occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Inefficient removal of formaldehyde and toluene from the air","Impact":"Increased health risk due to elevated formaldehyde and toluene levels","Mitigation":"Use of more effective sorbent beds, optimization of airflow rate","Technologies":"Advanced sorbent materials, airflow sensors","People":"Occupants, public health officials","Owner":"Building management"}]}
